00040 void advDisplay_printVoltage(){
00041                 char output[20] = "";
00042                 double volt = 0;
00043 
00044                 //get currente voltage value
00045                 bot_update();
00046                 //calculate the voltage from adc-value
00047                 volt = 0.0166 * bot_supply -1.19;
00048                 //concat output string
00049                 sprintf(output, "VCC: %2.1f V", volt);
00050 
00051                 //move to the position on the display where to write
00052                 gfx_move(logo_width,0);
00053 
00054                 //draw text

00056 }

00076 void advDisplay_clear(){
00077 
00078         int i = 0;
00079         //stop interrupts
00080         cli();
00081 
00082         //clear with whitespaces
00083         for(i = 10; i <= 50; i = i +10){
00084                 gfx_move(logo_width, i);
00085                 gfx_print_text("             ");
00086         }
00087 
00088         for(i = 0; i < terminal_lines; i++){
00089                 strcpy(terminal_text[i],"                    ");
00090         }
00091 
00092         terminal_head = 0;
00093         terminal_count = 0;
00094 
00095         //enable interrupts
00096         sei();
00097 }

00103 void advDisplay_append_line(char *txt){
00104 
00105         //calculate index for the new line in terminal_text
00106         int index = (terminal_head + terminal_count)%terminal_lines;
00107 
00108         //copy the line into terminal_text array at calculated index
00109         strcpy(terminal_text[index], txt);
00110 
00111         if(terminal_count < 5){
00112                 terminal_count++;
00113         }
00114         else{
00115                 terminal_head = (terminal_head++)%terminal_lines;
00116         }
00117 
00118         //refresh the terminal output on the display
00119         advDisplay_printTerminal();
00120 }

00125 void advDisplay_printTerminal(){
00126         int i;
00127         int index;
00128 
00129         for(i = 0; i < terminal_count;i++){
00130 
00131                 //clear line
00132                 gfx_move(logo_width,10 + 10*i);
00133                 gfx_print_text("                      ");
00134 
00135                 //print line
00136                 index = (terminal_head + i)%terminal_lines;
00137                 gfx_move(logo_width,10 + 10*i);
00138                 gfx_print_text(terminal_text[index]);
00139                 delay(10);
00140         }
00141 
00142 }
